job.title: Software Developer Manager - Machine Learning
job.description: brstrongSummarybrstrong brApples GPU Compute and Advance Rending team provides a suite of high performance GPU algorithms and computation graph for developers inside and outside of Apple for iOS macOS and tvOS Team is passionate about providing acceleration for machine learning frameworks like TensorFlow amp PyTorch and algorithms across machine learning linear algebra image processing and ray tracing on Apples GPUs We are always looking for exceptionally hardworking individuals to grow our outstanding teambrbr brstrongKey Qualificationsbrstrong brProven programming and problem solving skillsbrbrGood understanding of machine learning fundamentalsbrbrExperience with system level programming and computer architecturebrbrStrong communication and teamwork skillsbrbr brstrongDescriptionbrstrong brOur team is looking for an engineering manager to lead the team responsible for building and maintaining GPU acceleration support for machine learning frameworks like TensorFlow and PyTorch and collaborating with driver compiler metal frameworks and hardware groups to provide the best acceleration of ML Training on current and future HW The ideal candidate would have previous technical leadership experience Machine Learning experience understanding of GPU architecture and be willing to learn about new technologiesbrbr brstrongEducation amp Experiencebrstrong brBS or MS Degree or equivalent experiencebrbr brstrongAdditional Requirementsbrstrong br  Experience with machine learning libraries TensorFlow PyTorch adding runt time and computation graph support is a plusbrbrbr  Experience with high performance parallel programming GPU programming experience a plusbrbr brRole Number 200259247brbr
